text: Gei goodou gi helekai labelaa gi mee boloo, ‘Dau dangada hai hegau go Jacob e hanimoi i madau muli.’” Jacob ga hagamaanadu hua i ono lodo boloo, “Au ga haga manawa lamalia di manawa o Esau gi agu kisakis ala guu hula i ogu mua. Dono madagoaa dela ma ga heetugi mai gi di au, holongo gei mee ga dumaalia mai gi di au.”
